aboutMeDialog.title: About Me
aboutMeDialog.description: I am a passionate full-stack web developer. I am capable of planning, documenting, and developing complete systems using different methodologies. Additionally, I create systems that adhere to SOLID principles and Clean Architecture. I have a great hunger for knowledge in everything related to computing, and I always strive to improve myself by learning new technologies, architectures, and design patterns to evolve to the maximum extent.
